definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: I want to thank Tom and the Chamber and all of the sponsors for hosting this dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我要感謝湯姆和美國商會以及晚餐會的所有主辦方。

sentences.english: You might gain weight for not having breakfast. What did you have for breakfast today?
sentences.chinese: 不喫早餐會變胖的，今天早餐你吃了什麼呢？

sentences.english: One of their targets was a monthly breakfast meeting of Western executives.
sentences.chinese: 他們的目標之一是每月一次的西方長官早餐會。

sentences.english: We attended a dinner party hosted by the president of the company.
sentences.chinese: 我們參加了由公司總裁舉行的聚餐會。

sentences.english: But I have a breakfast meeting with the VP tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 但是明天我有一個和副總裁的早餐會啊。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan was present at the meetings.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇出席了午餐會。

sentences.english: Edith helm was not invited to these intimate luncheons .
sentences.chinese: 伊迪絲赫爾姆沒有被邀請出度反映親密關係的午餐會。

sentences.english: How many meals do you waste rice in a week?
sentences.chinese: 你一星期大約有多少餐會浪費食米？

sentences.english: Thanks for suggesting a lunch meeting.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你提議開一個午餐會。

sentences.english: What would your last meal be?
sentences.chinese: 你最後的晚餐會是什麼？

sentences.english: Could you make arrangements for a dinner party of 12 persons?
sentences.chinese: 你能幫我安排一個12人的晚餐會嗎？

sentences.english: There is a party tonight in honour of the appoinment of the new school president, would you come?
sentences.chinese: 今晚將爲新任校長舉行餐會，你想來嗎？

sentences.english: At the Palmer power plant breakfast, Jack is apprehended by Secret Service.
sentences.chinese: 在帕默舉辦早餐會的電廠裏，傑克被特勤處逮捕了。

sentences.english: Some meals may include appetizers, soup or salad before the main course.
sentences.chinese: 在主菜之前，有些聚餐會上開胃菜，湯品或者沙拉。

sentences.english: Of course. Is the dinner still on?
sentences.chinese: 當然去。你的晚餐會還開嗎？

sentences.english: Back home, it was time for my last National Prayer Breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 回國時，正好是我最後一次主持全國祈禱早餐會。

definition: to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
to deliver (a diploma, licence etc)/to qualify
member of a board of directors
to get together all at once
